alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 02 at 1:16AM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow above 3000 feet will continue through the night. Additional snowfall accumulations are likely and winds gusting as high as 40 mph are expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will continue to be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds will create areas of blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At midnight...The Arizona Department of Transportation reported Interstate 40 east of Kingman remains closed at Highway 93 south and Route 66 remains closed northeast of Kingman. In addition, State Route 68 west of Kingman to Bullhead City is ice and snow covered as well as Highway 93 northwest of Kingman. Travels should heed any road closures and use extreme caution on roadways throughout central and southern Mohave County.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
